pages.text: Use the power of the stars to enhance yourself or your tools and weapons, let you fly, and make some majestic (and large structures).

Start by exploring Astral Sorcery structures you find around the world and looting 'Constellation Papers' from them, as well as some marble.  After that, check the journal and find a lake/river to search for aquamarine found in the sand that's exposed to the sky.

You can attune yourself to different Consellations and 'level' them up as you gain experience in them, unlocking new abilities and passive bonuses.  Large scale rituals where you can smite your enemies, make crops grow quicker, and even turn stone into ore deposits.  If you are having a hard time with monsters, you can also make upgraded weapons and attune a cloak to receive additional bonuses. You might even find a rare liquid starlight reservior!
